trans-unit.source: Presents [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] janela.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Muitos membros desta classe não estão disponíveis na zona de segurança da Internet.

trans-unit.source: An HwndSource implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Um HwndSource implementa um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] janela pode conter [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] é dispostos conteúdo na janela da, medido e composto; e interativa de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features.
trans-unit.target: Porque o HwndSource foi concebido especificamente para interagir com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], esta classe expõe vários de baixo nível [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] funcionalidades.

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to do the following: - Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta classe para fazer o seguinte: - especificar os estilos de janela, estilos de classe de janela, e expandido estilos de janela.

trans-unit.source: - Hook the window procedure.
trans-unit.target: -Lhe estabelecer ligação o procedimento de janela.

trans-unit.source: - Provide access to the window handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: -Fornecem acesso para o identificador de janela (HWND).

trans-unit.source: - Destroy the window.
trans-unit.target: -Destrua a janela.

trans-unit.source: The HwndSource class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HwndSource foi concebida para interoperabilidade geral e não foi concebida como um wrapper HWND gerido.

trans-unit.source: In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, não fornece métodos para manipular a janela ou propriedades para inspecionar o estado de gerido.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the HwndSource class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A> property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a classe de HwndSource fornece acesso à [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] identificador de janela (HWND) através de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>propriedade, o que pode ser transmitida através de técnicas de PInvoke para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] para manipular a janela.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Construction** Many aspects of the HwndSource can only be specified at construction time.
trans-unit.target: **A construção** muitos aspetos do HwndSource só podem ser especificados durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: To create an HwndSource, first create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure and populate it with the desired parameters.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um HwndSource, primeiro crie um <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>estrutura e preenchê-lo com os parâmetros pretendidos.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: These parameters include the following: - The class, window, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: Estes parâmetros incluem o seguinte:-a classe, a janela e a janela expandida estilos.

trans-unit.source: You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar PInvoke para alterar os estilos depois da janela é criada.

trans-unit.source: Not all styles can be changed after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Nem todos os estilos podem ser alterados depois da janela é criada.

trans-unit.source: Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentação antes de alterar os estilos de janela.

trans-unit.source: - The initial position of the window.
trans-unit.target: -A posição inicial da janela.

trans-unit.source: - The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: -O tamanho inicial da janela, nomeadamente se o tamanho especificado ou deve ser determinado a partir do tamanho determinado do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: - The parent window.
trans-unit.target: -A janela principal.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook> to include in the window procedure chain.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>para incluir na cadeia de procedimento de janela.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar um hook durante a construção, este recebe todas as mensagens para a janela.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> to add a hook after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>para adicionar um hook depois da janela é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The transparency settings.
trans-unit.target: -As definições de transparência.

trans-unit.source: A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Uma janela de nível superior pode ser configurada para se misturem com outras janelas no ambiente de trabalho, de acordo com a transparência por pixel do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: To enable this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar esta opção, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser especificada durante a construção e apenas através de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>assinatura de construtor e impõe várias limitações.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>

trans-unit.source: After you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure, pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor for the HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: Depois de a preencher a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>estrutura, transmiti-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>construtor para o HwndSource.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: **Object Lifetime** An HwndSource is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: **Duração de objetos** um HwndSource é um regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] objeto e a respetiva duração é gerido pelo garbage collector.

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource represents an unmanaged resource, HwndSource implements <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: Porque o HwndSource representa um recurso não gerido, HwndSource implementa <xref:System.IDisposable>.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Synchronously calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread.
trans-unit.target: Chamar de forma síncrona <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>destroys imediatamente o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] janela se a chamada a partir do thread de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada de outro thread, o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] janela é destruída no modo assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>explicitamente do interoperating código poderá ser necessário para determinados cenários interoperação.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Window Procedures** The HwndSource class implements its own window procedure.
trans-unit.target: **Procedimentos de janela** HwndSource a classe implementa o seu próprio procedimento de janela.

trans-unit.source: This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input.
trans-unit.target: Este procedimento de janela é utilizado para processar mensagens de janela importantes, tais como os relacionados com o esquema, composição e de entrada.

trans-unit.source: However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, também pode ligue o procedimento de janela para utilização própria.

trans-unit.source: You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, or you can also use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> to add and remove hooks after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar o suas próprias hook durante a construção, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, ou também utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A>para adicionar e remover hooks depois da janela é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing.
trans-unit.target: Os hooks são denominados por ordem de último First Out, que permite que a sua hooks ser executado antes do processamento incorporado.

trans-unit.source: The actual hooks are held by a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Os hooks reais são detidos por uma referência fraca.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, certifique-se de que gere a duração do seu delegado de rotina.

trans-unit.source: For more information about HwndSource and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre HwndSource e outras classes interoperação, consulte [WPF e Win32 interoperacionalidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Notice how the constructors for HwndSource take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462).
trans-unit.target: Repare como os construtores para HwndSource tirar parâmetros assemelhar-se os parâmetros para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] funciona como [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462).

trans-unit.source: Scale transformations should not be applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A> of an HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: Transformações de escala não devem ser aplicadas a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>de um HwndSource.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações para <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class by using a structure that contains the initial settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> classe através da utilização de uma estrutura que contém as definições iniciais.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Este método não está disponível na zona de segurança da Internet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values.
trans-unit.target: Esta assinatura de construtor poderá ser mais prática em determinadas situações, porque a estrutura de predefinida contém alguns valores adequados predefinido inicial.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you use this signature, do not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor to construct the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure for the `parameters` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se utilizar esta assinatura, não utilize a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>construtor para construir o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>estrutura para o `parameters` valor.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>construtor permite-lhe especificar um nome de janela inicial.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor and create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> with it, that <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>construtor e criar um <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>com o mesmo, que <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>não apresenta porque um nome de janela inicial é um requisito de construção para o HWND representado.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: A structure that contains the parameters that are required to create the window.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém os parâmetros que são necessárias para criar a janela.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class with a specified class style, style, extended style, x-y position, name, and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> classe com um estilo de classe especificada, o estilo, expandido estilo, posição x-y, nome e a janela principal.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Este método não está disponível na zona de segurança da Internet.
